pkgmetadata.longdescription: Small Area Estimation for Key Health and Demographic Indicators from Household Surveys // Enables small area estimation (SAE) of health and demographic indicators in low- and middle-income countries (LMICs). It powers an R 'shiny' application for generating subnational estimates and prevalence maps of 150+ binary indicators from Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS). It builds on the SAE analysis workflow from the 'surveyPrev' package. For documentation, visit https://sae4health.stat.uw.edu/. Methodological details can be found at Wu et al. (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2505.01467.
